Question
========

![](vufgb-sumofsquares-017-nl-graph01.jpg)
  
Answerlist

* Tussengroeps kwadratensom ($SS_{within}$)
* Binnengroeps kwadratensom ($SS_{between}$)
* Binnengroeps kwadratensom ($SS_{within}$)
* Tussengroeps kwadratensom ($SS_{between}$)


Solution

* Incorrect
* Correct
